00070 #ifndef __OSINCLUDE_H
00071 #define __OSINCLUDE_H
00072 
00073 //
00074 // This file contains contains the window's specific datatypes and
00075 // declares any windows specific functions.
00076 //
00077 
00078 #if !(defined(_WIN32) || defined(_WIN64))
00079 #error Trying to include a windows specific file in a non windows build.
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #define STRICT
00083 #define VC_EXTRALEAN 1
00084 #include <windows.h>
00085 #include <assert.h>
00086 
00087 
00088 //
00089 // Thread Local Storage Operations
00090 //
00091 typedef DWORD OS_TLSIndex;
00092 #define OS_INVALID_TLS_INDEX (TLS_OUT_OF_INDEXES)
00093 
00094 OS_TLSIndex OS_AllocTLSIndex();
00095 bool        OS_SetTLSValue(OS_TLSIndex nIndex, void *lpvValue);
00096 bool        OS_FreeTLSIndex(OS_TLSIndex nIndex);
00097 
00098 inline void* OS_GetTLSValue(OS_TLSIndex nIndex)
00099 {
00100    assert(nIndex != OS_INVALID_TLS_INDEX);
00101    return TlsGetValue(nIndex);
00102 }
00103 
00104 #endif // __OSINCLUDE_H
